author: MICHELLE L. PRICE / AP
title: Las Vegas Mayor Called Reckless for Suggested Her City Could Serve as a Test for Reopening
description: Nevada officials condemned comments by Las Vegas Mayor Carolyn Goodman after she called for casinos and other businesses to reopen.
content: LAS VEGAS — Nevada officials condemned comments Wednesday by Las Vegas Mayor Carolyn Goodman after she called for casinos and other nonessential businesses to reopen and suggested the city could serve as a test case to measure the impact during the coronaviru… [+3775 chars]
